casebody.data:
Thomas A. STOKES, III
v.
Catherine C. CRUMPTON (formerly Stokes) No. 168A16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Kieran J. Shanahan, Attorney at Law, Christopher S. Battles, Attorney at Law, John E. Branch, III, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Stokes, Thomas A. (III). K. Edward Greene, Attorney at Law, Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Crumpton, Catherine C. (formerly Stokes). Robert A. Ponton, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition for discretionary review, filed by Plaintiff on the 9th of May 2016 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-31 and the Appellate Rule 16(b) as to issues in addition to those presented as the basis for the dissenting opinion in the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the petition for discretionary review as to additional issues is

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).

Edmunds, J. recused
